author: deweese
msg: 1) Fixed bug 34115 - CSSStyleDecl doesn't collapse properties.
2) JSVGCanvas no longer holds cached biewBox so it responds
properly when viewBox is updated in SVG content.

author: deweese
msg: New tests for recent bug fixes.

author: deweese
msg: Fixed a bug where cloned id attributes weren't identified as being 'id'.

author: deweese
msg: 1) Fixed updates to SVG Font based text (PR 34041)
The problem was that with a Null TextPainter the SVG
Font based text computed zero size.
Thanks Andreas for reporting the problem.
2) AbstractParentNode will now throw a DOM Hierarchy exception
if you try to append a node as a child of it's self (PR 34030)
3) Some code cleanup in the ThumbnailDialog.
4) Bug fix in NumberParser (thanks dvholten)

author: deweese
msg: 1) Fixed handling of complex paint types (base types with
fallbacks).
2) Fixed CSS SVG DOM interfaces for complex paint types
(see bug 33923).  Added new test for same.
3) Text Selection events are now generated even when the
done event is not over a graphics node.
4) The double '#' bug is gone in the SVG Pretty Printer. PR 33890
5) The worst of the 'extra spaces' problem with the pretty printer
is solved.  It will still tend to create white space before
and after element tags (start & end).  Probably the best
solution for this would be to go to something like:
<foo att1="bar
>Some Text</foo
This would eliminate much of the pressure to insert
char data whitespace for formatting (it would also generate a
more compact DOM).
6) Applied mailing-list patch from Jeremias (Thanks!)
